metadata.title: CVE-2018-19960 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The debug_mode function in web/web.py in OnionShare through 1.3.1, when--debug is enabled, uses the /tmp/onionshare_server.log pathname forlogging, which might allow local users to overwrite files or obtainsensitive information by using this pathname.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
